医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
联合扫描技术可以改善早期乳腺癌患者的治疗今天在第 14 届欧洲乳腺癌会议上公布的一项试验中，对早期乳腺癌患者使用联合扫描技术改善了近十分之三的治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Combined-scanning-technique-could-refine-treatment-for-early-stage-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Combined-scanning-technique-could-refine-treatment-for-early-stage-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75bcd8b4-2e30-4a9c-923e-63332ab49c23 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 16:07:00 -0400 Combined scanning technique could refine treatment for early-stage breast cancer patients
研究人员开发人工智能工具来预测乳腺癌患者治疗的副作用一组国际研究人员开发了一种人工智能（AI）工具，可以预测哪些乳腺癌患者在手术和放疗后可能面临副作用的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Researchers-develop-AI-tool-to-predict-side-effects-of-treatment-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Researchers-develop-AI-tool-to-predict-side-effects-of-treatment-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebcd3be1-f8d0-4b7f-9509-ab210f469897 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 16:03:34 -0400 Researchers develop AI tool to predict side effects of treatment in breast cancer patients
应对 NHS 危机：专家呼吁立即每年注入 85 亿英镑现金NHS 需要在未来四年内每年立即注入约 85 亿英镑的现金，以弥补 320 亿英镑的资金缺口，并帮助应对当前的危机，特别是在等待时间、获得初级保健服务、劳动力和医疗服务等领域。 BMJ 委员会关于 NHS 未来的第二份报告中的专家表示，资本投资。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Tackling-NHS-crisis-Experts-call-for-immediate-c2a385-billion-yearly-cash-injection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Tackling-NHS-crisis-Experts-call-for-immediate-c2a385-billion-yearly-cash-injection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2330a3bb-ba68-4108-b94d-2f7377e011c3 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 15:57:58 -0400 Tackling NHS crisis: Experts call for immediate £8.5 billion yearly cash injection
新的人工智能系统可用于可靠地检测心脏淀粉样变性心脏淀粉样变性是一种严重的疾病，异常蛋白质（淀粉样蛋白）在心肌中积聚并损害心脏功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/New-AI-system-can-be-used-to-reliously-detect-cardiac-amyloidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/New-AI-system-can-be-used-to-reliously-detect-cardiac-amyloidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eff5dec1-5be7-4b29-80f1-8ee88503e406 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 15:53:00 -0400 New AI system can be used to reliably detect cardiac amyloidosis
用高砷水煮饭使数百万人面临健康风险谢菲尔德大学的一项新研究发现，使用砷含量高于建议水平的水可能会对数百万人造成严重的健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Cooking-rice-with-high-arsenic-water-puts-millions-at-health-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Cooking-rice-with-high-arsenic-water-puts-millions-at-health-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b9a2a2ee-e1da-40b1-b125-a33770c6ffe0 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 15:50:01 -0400 Cooking rice with high arsenic water puts millions at health risk
抑制参与身体应激反应的神经元可能会减少饮酒斯克里普斯研究中心的神经科学家发现，抑制参与身体应激反应的神经元可能会减少患有创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）和酒精使用障碍（AUD）的人的饮酒量，即使他们仍然经历与创伤相关的焦虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Inhibiting-neurons-involved-in-the-bodys-stress-response-may-reduce-alcohol-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Inhibiting-neurons-involved-in-the-bodys-stress-response-may-reduce-alcohol-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=537c9047-b2d7-466b-930b-b13280e4c533 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 15:44:32 -0400 Inhibiting neurons involved in the body's stress response may reduce alcohol use
通过 3D 生物打印推进胃癌的精准个性化医疗据国际癌症研究机构报告，胃癌是亚洲人群中最常见的疾病之一，其中韩国人的发病率在 2020 年位居全球第三。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Advancing- precision-personalized-medicine-for-gastric-cancer-with-3D-bioprinting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Advancing- precision-personalized-medicine-for-gastric-cancer-with-3D-bioprinting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d04f7a57-b9b8-4df3-9fc1-203bb5fdf196 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 15:39:49 -0400 Advancing precision personalized medicine for gastric cancer with 3D bioprinting
科学家揭示了与阿尔茨海默氏症和其他富含脂质的组织疾病有关的关键免疫调节因子西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员利用新型遗传和基因组工具，揭示了巨噬细胞免疫细胞在大脑等富含脂质的组织中的作用，增进了我们对阿尔茨海默病和其他疾病的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Scientists-shed-light-on-key-immune-regulators-involved-in-Alzheimere28099s-and-other-disorders-of-lipid-rich-tissues。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Scientists-shed-light-on-key-immune-regulators-involved-in-Alzheimere28099s-and-other-disorders-of-lipid-rich-tissues。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c59ad8a5-156d-494f-ac61-6a5a51224845 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 15:31:13 -0400 Scientists shed light on key immune regulators involved in Alzheimer’s and other disorders of lipid-rich tissues
联合药物治疗克服了侵袭性血癌免疫治疗的挑战苏黎世大学和苏黎世大学医院的研究人员发现，侵袭性血癌的癌细胞中的特定突变可以阻止 CAR T 细胞疗法等新型免疫疗法发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Concomitant-pharmacotherapy-overcomes-immunotherapy-challenges-in-aggressive-blood-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Concomitant-pharmacotherapy-overcomes-immunotherapy-challenges-in-aggressive-blood-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=023f1c80-2259-42a7-8196-f9bfb7e00a92 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 15:20:00 -0400 Concomitant pharmacotherapy overcomes immunotherapy challenges in aggressive blood cancer
研究人员开发出世界上第一个3D打印的“大脑模型”在维也纳 MedUni 和维也纳工业大学的一个联合项目中，开发出了世界上第一个 3D 打印的“大脑模型”，它以大脑纤维的结构为模型，可以使用磁共振成像 (dMRI) 的特殊变体进行成像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Researchers-develop-the-worlds-first-3D-printed-brain-phantom.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Researchers-develop-the-worlds-first-3D-printed-brain-phantom.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2dfd77d-5c1f-418d-b602-e417662b2730 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 15:06:00 -0400 Researchers develop the world's first 3D-printed "brain phantom"
